lender.name: terese
lender.loan_because: I believe in hard work and independence and helping people help themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I care for children ages 3-12 in a very large, predominately poor suburban elementary school

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: because i enjoy goiving more than i take.
lender.occupational_info: well i don't work because i'm only in the 9th grade. i'm not old enough to work just yet. but i'm doing this because i'm doing fundraising.

lender.name: Michael F. Deschenes
lender.occupation: Pre-Cast Quality Control + Handcraft Wire Jewelry
lender.loan_because: The possibilities of that person that I make a loan to may succeed enough to allow him or her to loan to someone less fortunate than themselves.
lender.occupational_info: During the day I inspect concrete products like manholes, bridges,box culverts. During the evening i handcraft wire jewelry from14kt rolled gold for my home based business.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: If we live in gratitude by giving freely and from the heart, we will receive the same.

lender.name: alan
lender.loan_because:
We're all brothers and sisters...
My favorite quote...
"A whisper can be stronger, as an atom is stronger, than a whole mountain." Louise Nevelson
lender.occupational_info: My job is incredibly fun, and I'm very grateful for the ability and outlet.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I admire these people that work so hard to make a living for their family. I feel blessed to be able to directly contribute to their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of premature and very sick newborn babies.

lender.name: memory of Gandenla
lender.loan_because: people helping people get a start towards their dreams is the best feeling in the world!

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: I want to help others out
lender.occupational_info: Deliver mail to the people for the Postal Service.

lender.name: ghaiss
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer, but I manufacture wood seating for wholesale.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference =)

lender.name: True
lender.loan_because:
I have been a single mom for much of my adult life, raising two sons on my own. I was very much an entrepeneur--making jewelry, doing graphic design, sewing, whatever I could do--to feed my kids.
I want to help other mothers to get on their feet. I am grateful to have the opportunity to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I design books, websites, CDs. I also make jewelry.

lender.name: Lynn and Craig
lender.loan_because: When I help anyone I feel on top of the world. Not only am I helping make a difference in this world, I am also making a difference in my life!
lender.occupational_info: I have a school for children ages 3 - 5 and also take care of children ages 6 weeks - 3 years. Best job in the world!!!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It is a good feeling to help someone for so little. God has blessed me, therefore I believe each person should a chance to live a better life for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from Healthcare Industry.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I was there and someone helped me.
lender.occupational_info: Being the best wife, friend, neighbor, mom, tutu, great-tutu & person I can be.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lender.name: Samiyah
lender.loan_because: I believe in doing unto others, as I would have them do unto me. I loan because I believe every person on this planet has a purpose and that it is our duty as human beings to assist each other in achieving our purpose.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist. I get to feel for the world, I get to entertain the world.

lender.name: Superiorgal
lender.loan_because: It is an opportunity to give back a small portion of all our abundance! There is great joy in being able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am comitted to my family and spend my days overseeing the affairs of my household. I also am privileged to teach my two children at home. This is my contribution to the future---to train up this young generation in the way they should go! They are the leaders of tomorrow.

lender.name: michelle
lender.loan_because: I desire to empower women all over the world. Plus, it's so darn fun!

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being involved in making this world become a better place to live

lender.name: brian
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to learn geography and economics and become attached to the people of the earth. A family could do this together and change their children's perspective towards others.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I prefer to offer a "hand up" over simply a handout.
lender.occupational_info: My hobby is my work... I collect postage stamps, and sell the extra ones on eBay.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Jon & Shantel
lender.loan_because: We have had many blessings in our lives and we give because it is rewarding to see how someoneâ€™s life can be improved with very little. It makes us happy to know we are helping make a difference.

lender.name: Les Drake
lender.loan_because: I believe small groups of people build economically strong communities, rather than large institutions who are not accountable to the community.
lender.occupational_info: heath care data analysis

lender.name: Azucena
lender.loan_because: i want to start my own business.

lender.name: Len & Pat
lender.loan_because: are you kidding. this is great....
lender.occupational_info: tax and travel why not help someone

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed in my life I feel compelled to share my blessings. As Mother Theresa says "Let us touch the dying, the poor, the lonely and the unwanted according to the graces we have received and let us not be ashamed or slow to do the humble work."
lender.occupational_info: An RN is a nurse that has completed a course of study and passed the proper examinations to become licensed and registered.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: It feels good! And I have seen how small things can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I talk on the radio. Really.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: (1) It is always time to give back. (2) The stories remind me of people I've met and known along this glorious journey called life.
lender.occupational_info: I know what it's like to need just a little more money to make your dreams come true. I have been inspired by others' profound generosity to me in my times of need. Between 2002 and 2007, $100 would change my life dramatically; now I can only hope that it do the same for others.

lender.name: Tristan
lender.loan_because: It is my responsibility to use what I have been given to help others.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I am finally in a position to help someone else. I believe in pay it forward...
lender.occupational_info: I make people's pets look and feel better.Being in an animal hospital,I have alot of clients that are older and in bad health,so I try to make them feel better by being clean and looking good.

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference in someone life!!!

lender.name: Laraine
lender.loan_because: We need to all support each other throughout the world. We are all human beings and we all deserve a chance. And this is a small way I can help to be part of the solution, not the problem.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse in an emergency room in a big city. We take care of the very rich and very poor. I love to make a difference in people's lives with excellent patient care.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: We all need to do whatever we can in whatever way we can to help each other. A loan like these are easy, the people we loan to probably help others in may other ways. We all do what we can do.
lender.occupational_info: I love photography and manipulating images using a computer. I love capturing images of people, nature, scenics. The view in a big city like this is very limited, yet all around us is the art of nature in every tree, flower, mountain, sky and face. I love trying to capture a glimpse of that art and beauty with a camera.

lender.name: Cooper
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the 2nd grade. I love school. I love math and reading. I like to help other children. I also like to save my money.

lender.name: Debra
lender.occupation: Public School Teacher and single mother of 2 girls

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: we are blessed and would like to extend a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I keep tally of where money is being earned and spent.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I think we should help one another when we can.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school every weekday from 9 am to 2:40 pm and take 6 classes: English, Spanish, Math, US History, Environmental Science and a course on Modern Africa.

lender.name: Gabriele
lender.loan_because: I came a long way from being in a battered women's shelter with an eight year old son. I like to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: I have a home that I am sharing with 6 persons in need of care.

lender.name: Susan & family
lender.loan_because: I hope it will give someone the ability to provide for themself through a successful business.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Director of a recreational facility for senior adults over the age of 55.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I got my biz going because of help, so its only right I pay it forward
lender.occupational_info: I produce straight to video documentaries and now I'm producing TV shows. Google "JayGee Ent. Jason)

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I'm tired of feeling like a hypocrite who always says "we really should help people in need more". I've decided it's time to do something however small it may be.
lender.occupational_info: I do rehabilitation and phyical therapy at an orthopaedic surgeon's office

lender.name: Nilanjana
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes this simple.

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: I can. At this time in my life, it selfishly makes me feel good to give. I love Mexico and visit there often. I look around at the opulence of the resorts, then at the homes of the real Mexican people and think -- how can I give back other than spending tourist dollars. Thanks to Kiva, Oprah and President Clinton for making me aware of this website!!!
lender.occupational_info: I work with hospitals implementing new computer systems, or upgrading their current ones.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone with a hand up not a hand out. These people seem to want to try to make a better life for themselves and I want to help them do it.
lender.occupational_info: I determine the value of property so that lenders can decide how much to loan an investor to buy the property.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: Good goes around. As a small business owner, I know the value of a loan. Thank you Kiva for making it easy to make a difference in this world!
lender.occupational_info: Besides travel, my husband and I are manufacturers of scones, shortbread and biscuits. We turned our dream into a reality and are pleased to partner with other budding entrepreneurs around the world.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: As a retired entrepreneur who was a single mother to 3 children, I know first hand how difficult it is at times. I hope that my small contribution will help another deserving woman reach the success that I did, both professionally & in raising my children who became very successful and happy adults. I am now at a time in my life to give back...Hopefully I will set an example to others. What a privilege this is! God Bless you women!
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired, I put myself through college at night while working a full time job and raising 3 children. I was an Accountant who always had another type of endeavor going at the same time; ranging from selling cosmetics door to door; to owning a house cleaning business; to owning my own Accounting Firm. I had to work very hard and made many sacrifices to get where I am today.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: Why not! If I can help in any way, then I will.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to help others.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: It is gratifying to see these business people working hard to help themselves. I am very happy to be a part of an endeavor by someone who wants to help themselves with a ligitimate business.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired but work part-time from home as a comptroller for a small firm that investigates death claims for insurance companies.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: It is my hope that everyone can feel the power & joy of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I mentor, motivate and look for jobs for other people.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work at home caring for my daughter.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who do not have the opportunities that we have in the United States. I respect their hard work.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: it helps people who want to help themselves. To be self-sufficient is empowering.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I admire and identify with a woman who is overcoming challenges in her life and does so by way of fabric and thread.
lender.occupational_info: My interest is in english smocking, quilting and bobbin lace.

lender.name: Krissy
lender.loan_because: I take for granted every day what I have and how fortunate I am. I would like to give something back
lender.occupational_info: I make loans for a living...but it's not as rewarding as this

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: Helping can be overwhelming and this site makes it so easy.
lender.occupational_info: I am an actress in LA on TV and films.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I loan because we can.
lender.occupational_info: Software development and photography.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because:
It's important to lend a helping hand and by doing so it makes the world a better place.
â€œThe best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.â€ -- Mahatma Gandhi

lender.name: Rajvee & Peter
lender.loan_because:
Everyone on Earth is related. Humans are dependent on our one planet, Earth. We need to work together to achieve bigger goals. Communities can be built through these businesses.
A human being has a wide range of potentials and life possibilities. If we want to live in peace and protect the earth for the future we need to recognize that human desperation is a threat to all of humanity. We should try to build a world where humans do not have to live in desperate situations because the power of the human mind and collective effort can sustain the whole world's population.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I lived in Ecuador for two months which changed my whole perspective on life. If I can give $25 to help change someone's life there, then that is money well spent.

lender.name: Kari
lender.occupation: Retired - mother of three, grandmother of five

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world :)

lender.name: The Nootenboom Family
lender.occupation: Compliance Consultant, Rx Tech, Elem. Students
lender.loan_because: This is an educational opportunity for our children to learn about helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Shai - focusing on 5th grade studies, aspires to be hydrologist or karate instructor (today at least). Jamie - plays well w/others in 3rd grade, no declared career choice currently. LOL!

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: Matthew 25:40
lender.occupational_info: I run a large, all volunteer, food pantry. We provide groceries with recipes for complete meals to the needy. We also offer information regarding the many other sources of assistance available for individual needs. Our goal is, to help people help themselves and get back on their feet. We make free Bibles, Christian literature, and sermon tapes available to all. Our ministry is solely church supported.

lender.name: Tanner & Maddie
lender.loan_because: The little we donate can help change someones live. "A little can do a lot"
lender.occupational_info: Custom Vinyl Lettering & Designs to help advertise businesses

lender.name: Micaela
lender.loan_because: I beleive you need a chance in order to have success in whatever you do.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small Dog Grooming business in Houston, Tx.

lender.name: Preston
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Aggie
lender.loan_because: Because I can!

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I can...because changing the world happens in small, but collective steps...because we are global citizens with the power to help each other...because I am inspired by the developers of this website and the individual entrepreneurs it represents...because it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I teach "Women's Studies" at university. Through this work I like to think I empower my students while also encouraging them to consider their own privilege and responsibilities as global citizens.

lender.name: Sepehr
lender.loan_because: Coming from a third world country, I know how lucky I am to be in America. Plus, I know the money can benefit the recipient more than me. =D

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: life is all about helping each other

lender.name: Mindy
lender.loan_because: Those who give love gather love, and I love to help those in need.

lender.name: Bridgette
lender.loan_because: The Lord loves a cheerful giver. I hope and pray that my son, Robert, will never have a need, such as food and shelter, but if he ever does, I pray that my kindness to others will cause blessings to fall on him and someone will be kind to him.
lender.occupational_info: For the past 5 years I have been involved with the Shashamane Foundation, a 501(c)3 non-profit organization. We have built a school in Ethiopia that now houses 600 students. Each year we put on a fashion show to raise money to assist the school. We have also created a magazine called AFAR, which I am the creative designer and editor. The magazine sales help to fund the school in Africa.

lender.name: Ateeya
lender.loan_because: it reminds me that one person can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I provide businesses with risk management advice and insurance product placement

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I lead a very privileged life compared to much of the world and I want to help other people who are trying to make a decent life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I teach French to English speaking high school students.

lender.name: Isaac
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with the ability to earn a good living. If i'm able to give someone a chance to better themselves then i will.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an IT Consultant. I configure and maintain Computer Networks for a wide variety of companies.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people in the agricultural industry around the world. Everyone deserves a chance to help themselves and their families prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I help cattle producers in Alberta, Canada to do better in their businesses.

lender.name: Suzanne,Carol and Gloria
lender.loan_because: I had recently watched a documentary on micro loans and I was so impresssed at what these organizations were doing but I didn't know how to donate to one. Then one day my girls and myself were watching the Oprah show and found out about Kiva, we immediately went to the web site to find someone to help. My girls are so excited about the idea of doing the important job of helping someone feed their family my oldest has a birthday coming up and she donated her birthday money to Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: Students and a teacher

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to give back. As a person who started his own business I understand the importance of funding/risk model. We all ha ve our dreams and we need partners to accomplish them.
lender.occupational_info: I own a consulting company. We specialize in helping high tech firms grow there business thru, building, fixing, coaching and providing winning sales strategies for Sales Teams.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have a small business and I know how hard it can be to start

lender.name: Joachim
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help build the Internet.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I care for Elderly Men and Women and young men and women who have brain damage. I work for a physical therapist who prescribes exercise for people who got very very hurt at work. I help them walk again.

lender.name: Ramona and Ruwan
lender.loan_because: We believe that this is one of the best ways to alleviate poverty and change the world - one family at a time.

lender.name: Eddie
lender.loan_because: I believe that we can all make a difference in the life of someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I deal with a variety of people and work for a company that believes in taking care of the world as well as in the value in helping others.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to assist in the areas devastated by US policies
lender.occupational_info: Even though I have retired, I continue to work part-time. I web enable curriculum for migrant high school students

lender.name: Jeanne (Amenlady)
lender.loan_because: Jesus said to give... "Freely you have received, freely give." I am so thankful for this excellent idea to help people whom are working to make their own lives better, often in places where that is difficult.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife for 36 years, mother of 5 childen, grandmother to 11. I have worked various jobs including customer service, Hair cutting and medical dispatcher for emergency medical heart teams. Currently I just serve my family at home and serve the Lord Jesus Christ through my church.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: It matters.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that the people's bills are correct, help them with questions about their bills, and make sure they pay them.

lender.name: KENEDY,LIZ & BABY FLORA
lender.loan_because: its a blessing to share

lender.name: V.T.
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people become self-sufficient. This program focuses on the proverbial act of teaching people to fish, rather than serving them a meal.
lender.occupational_info: Lead the Americas division of a large, global corporation.

lender.name: Devlin
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help people get on their feet in a developing country.

lender.name: Mahesh
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in this world and want to be able to give back and help others.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of computers at a local university

lender.name: yashoda Gowda
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone needs a chance to find their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy, sell or rent homes.

lender.name: Isa
lender.loan_because: at some point, someone stood up for me. I could never pay them back, so I will pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info:
I train people to use computers and create web sites.
Join Our Team:

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I belileve that individuals are the keys to their own success.
lender.occupational_info: Work in technology and volunteer to organizations in my community.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it can be to start and run a business. I hope that my success can help others around the world achieve the same satisfaction I feel at a job well done.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I wanted to make a loan after I saw Oprah's program about giving. I am a big believer in giving to developing countries. In the U.S. we have so much more, and we can give a little to help others "learn how to fish". I like giving to people who are willing to work hard. I especially was interested in loaning to someone in Ecuador because I lived in Quito for a year. I remember flying into Guayaquil on the way to visit the Galapogas Islands. I want to contine to make loans every month.
lender.occupational_info: I teach seven-eight year olds. We focus mostly on reading and math. I've been teaching for 25 years and I love it.

lender.name: Sandi
lender.loan_because: I beleive if everyone gave just what they could afford this entire world would be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired but I am part owner and investor in a business my son runs. It is the limo business. We have 4 limos 2 are racing themed. We are doing so well and just want to help someone get started in their own business.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me in so many ways.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.occupational_info: commercial real estate

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to teach my daughter that there are better, unselfish ways to treat people in our vast world.

lender.name: wendy
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and have been blessed with the resources and opportunities to make my own life better and want to give others those same opportunities.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I think it is an awesome idea that such a small thing for me means such a great thing for someone else!
lender.occupational_info: I am an assistant manager for a big box retailer. I manage our apparel, home decor, and home "essentials" departments.

lender.name: Matty
lender.loan_because: Women need to become more independent.
lender.occupational_info: I work at home doing computer and Internet research. I happen to not be working at the present time.

lender.name: stephanie
lender.loan_because: I believe we all must do what we can. I am fortunate to live where I do and to do what I do...so I help where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I make money with my voice:)

lender.name: Christina
lender.occupational_info: I am a second year PhD student in European history and work part-time in administration at Harvard University.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I run a very busy real estate law office. We help people buying and selling their homes; setting up new businesses, etc.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: It is a way to give back for all the blessings I've had in my life.

lender.name: allison
lender.loan_because: each small stream becomes a river, and this gives life and possibilities.

lender.name: Erika, Mo and Zia
lender.loan_because: Everyone can make a difference no matter how small a contribution. Lending a hand to a stranger makes the world a better place.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I have learned in life that "what goes around, comes around".

lender.name: Romeo
lender.loan_because: I want to provide people the tools they need to get ahead in their life so they in turn can help their family and community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor.

lender.name: MHarrin
lender.loan_because: Kiva offers a way for people to reach around the world and give someone else a hand up.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand now and then
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: It feels great ...
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank during the day and in my spare time I make and sell t-shirts

lender.name: sue
lender.loan_because: To help end poverty across the world. Sharing the blessings we have been given. It feels good!
lender.occupational_info: I inspect airplane parts for Boeing airplanes

lender.name: Annika
lender.loan_because: I can.....because this can change someones WHOLE life and I love to help people and make a difference!!! Oh, and it makes me smile!

lender.name: Merrick & Karen
lender.loan_because: Oprah told me to.

lender.name: maria
lender.loan_because: "Helping other is the greatest gift"

lender.name: edward
lender.loan_because: I can, and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: retail mgr

lender.name: Daren and Lynda
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: karyn
lender.loan_because: I want to lend a hand up to those trying hard to provide for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Kathy J
lender.occupation: Natural Resource Specialist - US Forest Service
lender.loan_because: Its a way to "pay it forward." I've been blessed with friends and family who have supported me when I needed it. This is an opportunity to help others realize their dreams.

lender.name: Christina Louise
lender.loan_because: Women have increased mobility, are more visible in their communities and play stronger roles in decision making when they have access to affordable capital. Also, poor women tend to have the best credit ratings.

lender.name: Sandi & Children
lender.loan_because: some wonderful people helped me when I was homeless and I just want to give a little back in return.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the computer all day long communicating with people all over the world.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: To inspire, to help and to make the world better. One small helping hand can lead to so many more.
lender.occupational_info: Getting product to store so it can be sold.

lender.name: Marcy
lender.loan_because: this is a fantastic concept that allows so many people to make a difference in the lives of others so far away and I wanted to be a part of something so good.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: Of need
lender.occupational_info: Raising my 15 year old granddaughter

lender.name: Edward and Jennifer
lender.loan_because: We want to help people that desire the independance of owning their own business, and to make a better life for their family.
lender.occupational_info: We own a small business ourselves, in the construction industry.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: We all live in the same world, we all deserve to work to improve our lives. I give because there are people in need that deserve the same chance as everyone else in the world to have a good life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office helping my company to develop new scientific technology the help improve the world.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I travel all over the world demonstrating software for airlines.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: I want the people who are trying to make a difference in their lives to have the support to get them there.
lender.occupational_info: I graduated from University a year ago and I now work for our energy utility company in the accounting department. My dream is to become an entrepreneur one day...but for now I am happy to support other people who are working towards their dreams.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I care about people trying to succed and know they will pass on their gifts to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Cargill, a world wide company. I trade commodities

lender.name: Aidan J.
lender.loan_because: I like helpin people!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in 7th grade

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: Everybody does better when EVERYBODY does better.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a college. In my free time, I volunteer for a community project documenting the history of African Americans in my city. I enjoy learning U.S. history, camping, traveling with friends, and taking photos.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to do so.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: the Golden Rule (approximately as a Kantian categorical imperative and as determined behind a Rawlsian veil of ignorance)
lender.occupational_info: I am a singer-songwriter and grad student in philosophy at SFSU

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: helping others is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Lorna
lender.loan_because: I've been poorer and I could have used help, I'm so over joyed I can do this little bit for someone to prosper and have a better life! I do it with love.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help others heal, emotionally, physically and spiritually. In return I am helped and heal emotinally, physically and spiritually.

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: I want people to succeed, to grow and learn from each other. I support hard work and creativity.
lender.occupational_info: I help take care of elders in a long term care home who have health concerns that pevent them or their families from caring for themselves.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: as John Donne wrote, no man is an island, and so, those who have been blessed have a moral imperative to help others

lender.name: Denise Miranda
lender.loan_because: it helps make someone's load a little lighter.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I want to impact the future.
lender.occupational_info: I work with educators to improve student achievement for each and every child.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: It feels so GOOD! As a Realtor, I'm a small entrepeneur myself. How cool to be able to know what another small business person is going through and that I'm doing my small part to contribute to their success.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find a home to buy and I help people find someone to buy their home when they need to sell it.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an investment in humanity.
lender.occupational_info: I'm helping to find medicine for diseases.

lender.name: Akiko
lender.occupation: Mom, Fiber Artist, Int'l Development Consultant
lender.loan_because: I was born and raised in a developing country and strongly believe in the power of being able to empower someone and make a difference directly in that person's life and the life of his/her family!
lender.occupational_info: I care and raise my 2 years old son, Nicolas. I used to work in international development before becoming a Mom, and know first hand the importance and impact that microfinance can have for a small entrepreneur. I am also a fiber artist, a yogini, an amateur web designer and a freelance photographer.

lender.name: Wil
lender.loan_because: It makes you feel good.

lender.name: Jeff & Mary
lender.loan_because: "Give me a fish and I eat for a day. Teach me to fish and I eat for a lifetime.â€

lender.name: Gail & Bruce
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want to meet and help others in different countries in a practical way. It helps me feel connected in a more personal way to people in need.

lender.name: Peter and Leah
lender.loan_because: John F Kennedy once said : If not us, Who? If not now, When? Pass along your blessings and see how the world can change ~

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: To borrow a friend's favorite quote, "We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give." -- Winston Churchill
lender.occupational_info: I take care of children with kidney diseases.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: janie
lender.loan_because: it might make a differance to someone and it makes me feel good about myself

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: We all need a hand from time to time. Getting started or continuing to grow a business isn't always easy, this might help someone to "make it" in their business.
lender.occupational_info: I have a retail online business where I sell mainly crafting supplies. I enjoy crafts and enjoy building websites too!

lender.name: Paul & Lora
lender.loan_because:
We have the means to and were once in the same position as many of these borrowers.

lender.occupational_info: Paul is a manager with an oilfield services company and Lora is an interior designer.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: We often ask, "what would Jesus do?" I know he would be pleased with this!
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse in a Veteran's hospital. There are 49 veterans on my unit and I make sure they recieve the best care. The whole facility is the largest in my state where I live and holds almost 600 veterans. I have a son and daughter and two grandchildren whom I cherish dearly.

lender.name: dave
lender.loan_because: i love to help people who help their self love to see people get ahead in life
lender.occupational_info: i love my work it is taking care of my grand babys

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: To help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Providing help to passengers on airplanes

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: People have helped me when I needed it.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of children after school so their parents can work.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone occasionally needs a helping hand, and I am so happy that I am able to participate in this great program..

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: It is self rewarding!
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer, specifically I write menus for restaurants and include professional recipes which are created by my husband who is a Chef. I also write stories and paint .

lender.name: Tami
lender.loan_because: It is a simple way to make a difference in other parts of the world. Many people have invested in me over the years...investing in others is a good habit.

lender.name: Cassie Shuford
lender.occupation: Account Representative for a Non-Profit Organizati
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am able. Because I believe it is important to do so and is part of my spirit! Helping others to help themselves is core of everything good.
lender.occupational_info: I sell mathematics software to school systems who are working with students who do not read well or understand all the terms in Mathematics but would learn Math if explained without language as a barrier using spatial-temporal approach( visual) instead of terminology and formulas

lender.loan_because: I like to help

lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be a blessing.

lender.occupational_info: I am a first grade teacher.

lender.name: Kathy and Punky
lender.loan_because: Giving is rewarding in many ways. It makes someone else feel good and it makes me feel that I've done some good.
lender.occupational_info: I perform merchandising jobs in towns near my home. I also have a needlepoint business, where I stitch canvases for others.

lender.name: Larry & Carol
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to support someone who is trying to better themselves and wants to work for what they want.
lender.occupational_info: Enjoying early retirement from a sales, marketing, and training career.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: we all have a little to give
lender.occupational_info: I work with the elderly to get them strong and independent again.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to start my own business from the ground up. I am grateful for all the small loans I received while getting it off the ground.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Virtual Assistant. I help other business owners with administrative tasks so that they can focus on their business needs.

lender.name: QANTA
lender.loan_because: Thanks to God, I have more than I need...
lender.occupational_info: I look after people when they are sick. I teach other doctors to do the same.

lender.name: Retta
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I manufacturer cosmetics. I sell wholesale and retail.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I have often said that I would love to be wealthy for the opportunity to feel like I am really making a difference on a grand scale... well I'm still not wealthy. And as a public school teacher with a husband in graduate school I probably never will be. But Kiva makes it easy for me to feel I can truly have an international impact. I am increasingly impressed with the initiative of global minded philanthropists harnessing the power of technology!
lender.occupational_info: I'm the mother of a toddler daughter and a full time public school teacher. I teach Environmental Science and World History to 9-12th grade students that have learning, emotional and physical disabilities that make education extra challenging for them. While most of my kids come from disadvantaged backgrounds, I'm using Kiva as a tool in the classroom to teach them the importance of perspective and a global conscience. My classes will raise money and select Kiva loans to donate to!

lender.name: Tirman
lender.loan_because: We want to do our part to make a positive impact on the world and we consider providing loans via Kiva part of that effort. We value the entrepreneurial sprint, ambition and drive that we see represented in the individuals on this site and we want to do want we can to help them succeed.
lender.occupational_info: My Husband and I both work in eCommerce Business Management.

lender.name: Po ka. Dot
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone becoming independent.

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: I want to help woman in the third world countries become independent, become part of the economic cycle and be able to earn a living on their own.

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate for what I have and am thankful everyday to be able to work in a field I enjoy. I would like others to have the same fulfillment.

lender.name: Max Prescott
lender.loan_because: The world is a place that could use my help when I can.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: the world is like a big pond, and the ripples of success in one part of the world affect us all.
lender.occupational_info: I help my clients to communicate better with their customers.

lender.name: Kathie
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunities I have recieved in life, and want to be a demonstration of God's love to others.
lender.occupational_info: i try to help sick people get better.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: For the price of a few weeks' worth of lattes I can make a real impact on someone's future.

lender.name: Brian Moon
lender.loan_because: There are so many opportunities to help.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help others be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I am a middle school teacher. Some of my students come from Central and South America. I teach them reading, writing, and math.

lender.name: Sissy
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to need that little extra and not know where it's going to come from. I also know that it's okay to get a hand up sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a wine bar and retail shop in Bodega Bay, CA.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: those who have more need to help those who have less.
lender.occupational_info: I teach music in a high school.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach all subjects to elementary school children that are about 8 years old.

lender.name: Team Dollar
lender.loan_because: Because we can and we care.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I want to help women in need in Mexico. My son lives and works in Baja, I have a special love of the country. I watched Oprah and this web site was mentioned along with Bill Clinton's work.
lender.occupational_info: I spent 36 years educating young children in an economically impoverished area of San Diego, Ca. I want to see a child with needs grow up an be a proud, independent worker.

lender.name: Marguerite
lender.loan_because: people need the money.
lender.occupational_info: wedding minister

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: it's my spiritual practice to put back into the universe a portion of the blessings which I have received.
lender.occupational_info: Being a full-time Mom is the greatest joy in the world!

lender.name: LoriDuane&Seth&Levi&Sage
lender.loan_because: I know that I have more money than the vast majority of people in the world so I feel it is my responsibility to share that with others so that they can better their situations. It also teachers our children about the reality of the world and how we have so much more than what we need.
lender.occupational_info: I plan events that serve the purpose of raising funds and/or awareness of the museum that I work for. As well, I oversee the 250+ volunteer base at the museum.

lender.name: Stuart & Amanda
lender.occupation: TV Technical Director & Stay at Home Mom

lender.name: Tamara
lender.occupation: Stay at home Mom and Event Coordinator
lender.loan_because: I saw Kiva on Oprah and loved what the one lender said that it is the ultimate shopping experience. What a concept!
lender.occupational_info: I look after the home and our family. I organize IG's Ontario Northeast Region events.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: It's often the small things we do that make a big difference.

lender.name: Machelle
lender.loan_because: Most of us are blessed to excess! Why not share our blessings?

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to share my resources if I can - we are all in this together - our family, our sisters and brothers...

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because:
It's a great Idea!! I am so grateful for this opportunity to help.
Thank You Kiva!!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large wholesale chain, and I'm also a artist .

lender.occupation: Manager at AIG and Small Business Owner

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: it helps gives people the realization of their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I do sales in the fashion industry working with buyers, mostly small to medium businesses.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I absolutely love to.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a medium-sized company and advise the company on how to pay its employees.

lender.name: Ryan Allen
lender.loan_because: I am hoping that I can make a difference in someones life. It does not take much to help and it's easy to do. And you can do it from home. God bless Kiva for giving me the chance to help someone far less fortunate than me.

lender.name: Geneva
lender.loan_because: It is a good way to give back to the world.

lender.name: Kevin & Maurene
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who are trying to improve their lives.

lender.name: Deanna
lender.occupational_info: I work on a sports television station.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: I had a hard time through my younger days, raising my children on my own and trying to make ends meet. I am now blessed with a wonderful life and husband and want to help others toward there dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help maintain a webpage, take pictures and manage girls that make phone calls at a car dealership.

lender.name: Karron
lender.loan_because: I care. I want people to have every opportunity available to make a living and provide for their families. There are no limitations when you have a dream and I wish the best to all who pursue their dreams!

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I love this idea. I've been looking for a way to give in a way that could really make a difference. What a wonderful way for anyone and everyone to improve a life. God Bless!

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing what you have received, and help others have more opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children in a hospital,and I feel very lucky that everyday I get to go to work to do what I love.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: It's a great feeling to be able to help someone in this way. I intend to continue on indefinitely.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a hospital doing medical administrative work.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that strive to succeed.

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a break in life. I want to help those who really want to help themselves make their life better.
lender.occupational_info: Teach little children

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It is such a wonderful feeling knowing that I can give someone a helping hand in life. As a loan is repaid I can reach out to another person in need.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: The imbalance between rich and poor is frightening to me. Even if as an individual I do not fall into a category that most Americans would call "rich" what we collectively enjoy here in the USA is so much more that most people have around the world. I have seen what real poverty is and what it does to families. If I can be a small part of helping to stop it, I will.
lender.occupational_info: I teach the art, music and culture of West Africa to American college students, and I work with living artists from the African continent, both in the US and abroad, to advance their careers and their access to skills that they require. I also work with an elementary school in Keur Momar Sarr and a Nursery school in Louga, both in Senegal, to help provide educational resources and supplies for their students. This picture is of me and my friend, Khady, a professional dancer in Dakar, Senegal.

lender.name: Lorna
lender.loan_because: I can and I hope it will make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Ximena
lender.loan_because: I want to help improve the lives of people truly in need, and I believe a little help can make a BIG difference.

lender.name: Karolina
lender.loan_because: helping one person makes a difference.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I like to help people improve their livelyhoods.
lender.occupational_info: It is hard work but it is satisfying when I complete a job and that people trust me in their homes.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I like making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I groom dogs and cats, and clean their teeth

lender.name: Vinnie
lender.loan_because: by giving something small, I can help someone do something big.

lender.name: Valarie
lender.loan_because: My "little extra" could be the difference between someone making it or not making it. Helping someone help themselves -- great.
lender.occupational_info: I help senior citizens who can't afford the community services such as meals, prescription medicines as well as talk to those who are just sad or don't know where to turn.

lender.name: morgahn
lender.loan_because: I still believe one small kindness can change the world

lender.name: Robbi
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my children to give to others. After all, we all can make a difference!!

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe in karma!

lender.name: Tee
lender.loan_because: At the end of the day, all we have is each other.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I help my clients in finding their dream home,find a suitable purchaser for their home. I feel happy when my clients are happy

lender.name: Team Agnew
lender.loan_because: One person can make a bigger difference when joined with others. I want my daughters to experience that it is truly better to give and to " Pay it forward"!
